metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8947 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
hb-ot-layout-gpos-table.hh in HarfBuzz before 1.0.5 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (buffer over-read) or possibly have unspecified other impact via crafted data, a different vulnerability than CVE-2016-2052.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8947` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-harfbuzz-0.0 - 1.0.1-1ubuntu0.1
libharfbuzz-bin - 1.0.1-1ubuntu0.1
libharfbuzz-gobject0 - 1.0.1-1ubuntu0.1
libharfbuzz-icu0 - 1.0.1-1ubuntu0.1
libharfbuzz0b - 1.0.1-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: harfbuzz package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.1-1ubuntu0.1').
